symptoms: Long cranking, white smoke, low power
cause: Air in fuel, clogged fuel filter, weak battery
repair: Bleed fuel system, replace filters, test/replace battery or starter
prevention: Replace fuel filters; keep battery maintained

cause: Low coolant, clogged radiator, faulty thermostat, fan belt
repair: Top up/flush coolant, clean radiator, replace thermostat, check belt
prevention: Check coolant daily; clean radiator fins

symptoms: Bucket raises slowly, weak breakout force
cause: Low hydraulic oil, air in system, clogged filter, worn pump
repair: Top up/bleed oil, replace filters, test/replace pump
prevention: Check hydraulic level daily; replace filters on schedule

cause: Air ingress, wrong oil, overfilled tank
repair: Correct level, replace oil, fix breathers
prevention: Use correct oil; maintain correct fill level

cause: Low transmission oil, worn clutch packs, torque converter issues
repair: Refill oil, replace filters, inspect clutch/TC

cause: Flat battery, corroded terminals, faulty starter
repair: Charge/replace battery, clean terminals, test starter
prevention: Maintain battery terminals; check charging system

cause: Overheated brakes, worn linings, low fluid
repair: Allow to cool, replace linings, bleed system

cause: Low steering oil, worn pump, leaking cylinder
repair: Top steering oil, repair leaks, replace pump

cause: Sharp debris, overload, underinflation
repair: Replace damaged tyre, inspect rim

symptoms: Fault codes on display, reduced performance
cause: Sensor faults, ECM issues, wiring damage
repair: Read codes, repair/replace sensors/wiring

cause: Dirt ingress, lack of lubrication, worn pins
repair: Clean, lubricate, replace pins/bushes

cause: Dusty environment clogging core
repair: Blow out cores, clean fins, fit screens

cause: Water in fuel, microbial growth
repair: Drain separator, replace filters, clean tank
prevention: Use clean fuel; keep tanks sealed

cause: Faulty injectors, turbo faults, clogged air filter
repair: Test injectors, service turbo, replace air elements
prevention: Run clean air intake; test injectors

cause: Low transmission oil, worn clutch packs
repair: Refill oil, replace filters, overhaul clutch/TC

cause: Control valve fault, leaking cylinder, air
repair: Test/replace valve, repair cylinder, bleed system

cause: Loose tension, worn rollers, debris
repair: Adjust tension, replace parts, clean undercarriage

cause: Pump wear, low steering oil, damaged hoses
repair: Replace pump/hoses, top oil

cause: Core corrosion, puncture
repair: Repair/replace radiator, flush system

cause: Starter solenoid fault, poor battery connection
repair: Test solenoid, clean terminals, replace starter

symptoms: White smoke on start or continuous
cause: Coolant entering combustion (head gasket)
repair: Compression test; repair/replace head gasket

symptoms: High hydraulic temp, loss of power
cause: Overworked system, blocked cooler
repair: Check cooler, reduce load, replace oil

cause: Water/dirt in fuel
repair: Drain separators, replace filters

cause: Fatigue, abrasive conditions
repair: Replace sprockets, inspect track pins
prevention: Rotate parts; inspect after heavy use

cause: Worn ripper teeth, angle wrong
repair: Replace teeth, adjust angle, train operator

cause: Stuck caliper, misadjusted linkage
repair: Inspect/free caliper, adjust linkage

symptoms: Boom weak or no lift under load
cause: Worn boom seals, faulty relief, low pump flow
repair: Repack/replace seals, adjust relief, test pump
prevention: Oil analysis; keep suction strainers clean

cause: Restricted air filter, turbo failure, injector overfuel
repair: Replace air elements, test turbo, test injectors

cause: Travel motor failure, blocked case drain
repair: Check case drain, test motor, inspect pilot pressures
prevention: Change final drive oil; test motors

cause: Failed alternator, loose belt, corroded terminals
repair: Test/replace alternator, replace/tension belt, clean terminals

cause: Worn latch, hydraulic leak, control valve issue
repair: Replace latch, repair leak, test valve

cause: Worn seals, contaminated oil
repair: Rebuild/replace valve, flush system

cause: Tensioner failure, worn adjuster
repair: Repair tensioner, set sag correctly

cause: Clogged pilot filter, leak in pilot line
repair: Replace pilot filter, pressure test lines

cause: Clogged radiator, failed fan clutch, low coolant
repair: Clean radiator, replace fan clutch, top coolant

cause: Worn piston rings, valve seals, oil leaks
repair: Compression test, inspect leaks, overhaul engine

cause: Sensor failure, wiring, ECM error
repair: Read codes with tool, repair sensors/wiring

cause: Worn motor bearings, contaminated oil
repair: Inspect motor, change oil, replace if needed

cause: Clogged filter, water in fuel, failing pump
repair: Replace filters, drain separators, test pump

symptoms: No lift, jerky or uneven stages
cause: Stretched chains, leaking cylinder, sticky valve
repair: Adjust/replace chains, rebuild cylinder, service valve

cause: Air in lines, low brake fluid, worn pads
repair: Bleed lines, refill fluid, replace pads

cause: Directional solenoid fault, worn clutch
repair: Test/replace solenoid, inspect clutch packs

symptoms: Key won't turn or starter won't engage
cause: Steering lock, worn key, ignition switch failure
repair: Check steering lock, try spare key, replace switch

cause: Overloading, mast too high while moving
repair: Lower load, re-level, retrain operator
prevention: Keep forks low; follow load chart

symptoms: Engine stalls, won't run on LPG
cause: Regulator fault, empty tank, leak
repair: Inspect regulator, replace/refill tank, check lines

cause: Old battery, cell short, bad charger
repair: Load-test & replace battery, test charger

cause: Worn chain, poor lubrication
repair: Adjust/replace chain, lubricate

cause: Overload, wrong tire type, underinflation
repair: Replace tires, correct inflation, check load limits

cause: Worn seals, damaged cylinder
repair: Replace seals or cylinder, check relief valve

cause: Faulty switches, wiring, ECU issue
repair: Test/replace switches, repair wiring
